long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Gmail effortless

SpeedyG is for professionals that like Gmail but want to streamline common steps.

★★ Key features ★★

➤ Automatically link text without manually copying and pasting the URL

➤ Paste meeting availability without having to check your calendar

➤ Send calendar invites in just three clicks

➤ Draft emails from templates without starting from scratch

Contact us at support@speedyg.app with questions and feedback.

We at SpeedyG are committed to protecting your privacy. The information we gather or process from the SpeedyG Chrome extension is used solely for core functionality of SpeedyG and to improve the quality and security of our service. Your information isn’t and has never been sold to third parties. 

For more information on privacy and the security of your data visit https://speedyg.app/privacy/.
